document.heading: Medical Marijuana Expansion Amendment Act of 2014

history.narrative: Law 20-189, the “Medical Marijuana Expansion Amendment Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-766. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Oct. 7, 2014, and Oct. 28, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Nov. 12, 2014, it was assigned Act No. 20-474 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-189 became effective on Mar. 10, 2015.
